automate_with_vagrant.title: Automating Development Environment Setup
automate_with_vagrant.description: Automating development environment setup with Vagrant and VirtualBox
automate_with_vagrant.keywords: vagrant, development environment setup, automating, virtualbox
automate_with_vagrant.summary: Don't let development environment setup become your enemy! Automating the process with Vagrant can make your life a lot easier.

impostor_syndrome.title: Who is this idiot?
impostor_syndrome.description: A Software Developer tackling with her Impostor Syndrome. There's light at the end of the tunnel!?
impostor_syndrome.summary: Basic fact of life - real programmers start coding at their early teens, hack in their spare time and are always up to date with bleeding edge technologies. Another fact - these great expectations may lead to great burnouts.

plot_in_my_code.title: There's a Plot In My Code
plot_in_my_code.description: Writing code is a creative process, it's a lot like writing a screenplay
plot_in_my_code.summary: Creative writing enables you to create worlds and alter realities using only your mind. Programming is creative writing. Just the same as writing a screenplay I dare to say!
